Class TargetableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.isangeles.senlin.core.TargetableObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Voicing, ObjectiveTarget, Targetable, SaveElement

    public class TargetableObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable, SaveElement, Voicing
    Class for simple game objects
    Author:
    Isangeles
